name: events-parser
description: Events parser. Parsing events from dou.ua, ain.ua, meetup.com, fb.com, vk.com, bigcityevents.com and other
author: Maksym Vlasov <m.vlasov@post.com>

scripts.start: timeout_opts=$(cat /etc/os-release | grep ^ID= | sed 's/ID=alpine/t/' | sed 's/ID=ubuntu/k 600/'; echo -n ' 600'); timeout -$timeout_opts node main.js || echo 'KILLED BY TIMEOUT'
